metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10166 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was discovered that libvirtd, versions 4.x.x before 4.10.1 and 5.x.x before 5.4.1, would permit readonly clients to use the virDomainManagedSaveDefineXML() API, which would permit them to modify managed save state files. If a managed save had already been created by a privileged user, a local attacker could modify this file such that libvirtd would execute an arbitrary program when the domain was resumed.

criterions.comment: libvirt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
